name: New Super Mario Bros. Mii
description:
New Super Mario Bros. Mii is an arcade game developed by Nintendo.
You can play New Super Mario Bros. Mii on Wii U.
It was produced by Hiroyuki Kimura and Takashi Tezuka. It was directed by Masataka Takemoto. It was scored by Mahito Yokota and Shiho Fujii.
